Articles.Content: Other props are fine, and the ones in the generic props folder work if added manually to the iva config, but in unity they seem to all pink and broken...  Does anyone else see this?  Part tools 1.1.2

OK, found it.  Seems there are some shaders missing from part tools 1.1.2 when used with KSP 1.2

If you grab porkjet's parts overhaul, it has a source folder within.  I simply drilled down to the shaders and noticed that the archive had 19 more shaders then the shaders folder installed by parttools.  I copied the shaders from the archive into the shaders folder of my project, and told windows NOT to overwrite any files.  

Once I did that, the parts would still appear pink, BUT has the correct scripting attached and therefore will actually save to the IVA config file.

Once in game, the props all appear correctly.

Hope this helps someone in the future!
